attributes.action: Allow a full criminal investigation into fraudulent use of public funds by MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP Derek Conway has been exposed as paying  his sons and a friend of his son for work that they have not done, this money comes from public funds that we pay our taxes for.  His sons have already received a higher level of education than many of us can afford.If someone deliberate overclaims benefits it is fraud. So is this. Please sign to allow a proper investigation into Conway and other MP's by the police and CPS. To date he has effectively received a slap on the wrist.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DerekConwayMP/
A prosecution has not been prevented.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
